borderColor.description: Color of table borders, key of theme.colors or any valid CSS color
borderColor.description_zh: 表格边框的颜色、theme.colors 的键或任何有效的 CSS 颜色

captionSide.description: Determines on which side Table.Caption is displayed, bottom by default
captionSide.description_zh: 确定在哪一侧显示 Table.Caption，默认情况下显示在底部

data.description: Data that should be used to generate table, ignored if children prop is set
data.description_zh: 应该用于生成表的数据，如果设置了 children prop 则忽略

highlightOnHover.description: Determines whether table rows background should change to highlightOnHoverColor when hovered, false by default
highlightOnHover.description_zh: 确定鼠标悬停时，表格行背景是否应更改为 highlightOnHoverColor，默认情况下为 false

highlightOnHoverColor.description: Background color of table rows when hovered, key of theme.colors or any valid CSS color
highlightOnHoverColor.description_zh: 悬停时表格行的背景颜色、theme.colors 的键或任何有效的 CSS 颜色

horizontalSpacing.description: Horizontal cells spacing, key of theme.spacing or any valid CSS value for padding, numbers are converted to rem, default value is xs
horizontalSpacing.description_zh: 水平单元格间距、theme.spacing 的键或任何用于填充的 CSS 值，数字转换为 rem，默认值为 xs

layout.description: Value of table-layout style, auto by default
layout.description_zh: 表格布局样式的值，默认为 auto

stickyHeader.description: Determines whether Table.Thead should be sticky, false by default
stickyHeader.description_zh: 确定 Table.Thead 是否默认应为 sticky、false

stickyHeaderOffset.description: Offset from top at which Table.Thead should become sticky, 0 by default
stickyHeaderOffset.description_zh: Table.Thead 应变为粘滞的 Top 偏移量，默认为 0

striped.description: Determines whether every odd/even row background should be changed to strippedColor, if set to true, then odd value will be used, false by default
striped.description_zh: 确定是否应将每个奇数/偶数行背景更改为 strippedColor，如果设置为 true，则使用奇数值，默认为 false

stripedColor.description: Background color of striped rows, key of theme.colors or any valid CSS color
stripedColor.description_zh: 条纹行的背景颜色、theme.colors 的键或任何有效的 CSS 颜色

verticalSpacing.description: Vertical cells spacing, key of theme.spacing or any valid CSS value for padding, numbers are converted to rem, default value is xs
verticalSpacing.description_zh: 垂直单元格间距、theme.spacing 的键或任何用于填充的有效 CSS 值，数字转换为 rem，默认值为 xs

withColumnBorders.description: Determines whether the table should have borders between columns, false by default
withColumnBorders.description_zh: 确定表是否应在列之间具有边框，默认情况下为 false

withRowBorders.description: Determines whether the table should have borders between rows, true by default
withRowBorders.description_zh: 确定表是否应在行之间具有边框，默认情况下为 true

withTableBorder.description: Determines whether the table should have outer border, false by default
withTableBorder.description_zh: 确定表是否应具有外边框，默认情况下为 false
